thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Philson

author: Philson
title: Philson
text: We have been going through air miles for decades (snowbirds), there are always, no not this one, not not available.... finally we decided to check out FLIGHTHUB.... found this site easy to book, very fair in prices, clear on-line booking process. By far the best venue to book. We will book again, no question. Retirement life is all about less hassles, less frustration and fair prices to make the dollars stretch :-)
